solution_line_template: He starts with {initial_blue_marbles} blue marbles because {total_marbles} x {blue_percent_decimal} = <<{total_marbles}*{blue_percent_decimal}={initial_blue_marbles}>>{initial_blue_marbles}
{red_percent_num}% of the marbles are red because {total_percent} - {blue_percent_num} = <<{total_percent}-{blue_percent_num}={red_percent_num}>>{red_percent_num}
He has {initial_red_marbles} red marbles because {total_marbles} x {red_percent_decimal} = <<{total_marbles}*{red_percent_decimal}={initial_red_marbles}>>{initial_red_marbles}
He gets {new_blue_marbles} blue marbles because {traded_red_marbles} x {trade_ratio_blue} = <<{traded_red_marbles}*{trade_ratio_blue}={new_blue_marbles}>>{new_blue_marbles}
